description: This file defines an asynchronous function to run an agent prompt that interacts with MCP tools and an agent to perform a web scraping task related to oxylabs.io career page, utilizing environment variables for credentials and API keys.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class for Google-related API interactions, initialized with an API key.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: A context manager class for MCP command-line tool interactions.

methods.name: run_agent_prompt
methods.description: Asynchronous function that sets up MCP tools, initializes an agent with a Gemini model, and prompts it to perform a web scraping task.
